#summary Readme for the Clipboard Modifier tool

_The clipboard modifier spares you some time.

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

=== Options ===
*1. Modify IPs*
Removes all duplicates and increases the range by removing the last 1-3 digits (111.222.333.444 -> 111.222.333.)

*2. Remove doubles*
Removes duplicates alts.

=== Usage ===
    * Copy the list (with each name/IP on a new line
    * Choose one of the options
    * Done

=== Note ===
    * If you choose to open the IP ranges in the browser, it wont copy the rsult.
    * Do not open too many IPs in the browser or it might slow down your pc.
    * Link used: namelookup.php
